rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0002
rows.name:
When the going gets tough, the tough go to
the Scout Console. You know...to get tougher.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0003
rows.name: If you do end up joining us,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0004
rows.name: you'll quickly realize just how important this little kiosk is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0005
rows.name:
A lot of the Mission Control assignments
are too much for any one BLADE to handle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0006
rows.name:
They tend to call for multiple members
with specialized knowledge or unique skills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0007
rows.name:
This console lets you search for and recruit other BLADEs
to fill those roles for just such an occasion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0009
rows.name: Anyway, awesome, right? So you ready to join up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0010
rows.name: Hang on, Lin. Take it easy, would you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0011
rows.name:
What? I'm just saying, you'd have to be some kind
of an IDIOT not to want to join BLADE.[ST:page p1=120 ]...Or maybe a crazy person.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0012
rows.name: Oh. And here I thought you might be pressuring our guest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0014
rows.name: Now, how about a little shopping?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01070100_MSG0015
rows.name:
And I'm not talking about the stuff over in
the commercial district. I'm talking about Armory Alley![ST:wait ]
